name: (Se)Cura
description:
Once upon a time, there was a scientist who dedicated in inventing robots. One day, he received two orders. One was from an hacker who want to hack into a rich man bank account. Another one was from a rich man who want to protect his bank account......

Instruction

Control

Move     [ W ] [ A ] [ S ] [ D ]
Interaction on map     [ E ]
Use tools     [ 1 ] [ 2 ] [ 3 ]
Teleport     [ T ]
Destroy     [Space]
Select     Left click 
Close UI     [ ESC ]

How to start a game
Just press start game, create a room ID, then invite your friend to play with you together by the ID.
*If the room ID that you inputted is not exist, you will create a new room.

Game Overview

Plan which chest you’re going to buy !
(Time Limit: 60s)
In planning phase, you’ll able to allocate your 10 points to buy chests or tools that you want. Every chests and tools has their own special usage.

Place your chests into the map !
(Time Limit: 2mins)
The map has 8 slots in total that allow you to place your chests. Be careful on the slots that you have chosen. If hacker placed the hacking chest in the same place of where defender place the data chest, then the data chest will being hacked.

Protect and Attack !
(Time Limit: 8mins)
Defender, protect your data chests by keep changing the password and use those chests that have stronger strength. 
Hacker, use different hacking chests to try hacking the data chests!
You may use tools to obstruct others action.

Hide-and-Seek !
When the security level is higher than 25, defender can teleport to hacker's side to find the hacker and destroy him.
Meanwhile, hacker can also teleport to defender's side and destroy him when the security level is lower then -25.

Minigame!
(Time Limit : 10s)
Is this a good password?
You can find computer in the map and earn points by playing the minigame. You may purchase items after the minigame.

Victory Criteria

Hacker

  • Destroy defender on data side
  • When times is up, current security level lower than 1

Defender

  • Destroy hacker on dark side
  • When times is up, current security level higher than 0
